snippet: On Sunday Red Hook Jazz Festival, at the Urban Meadow community garden in Brooklyn, featured groups like Travis Sullivan’s Bjorkestra, Hot Cup Chili Pepper 7 and the Flail.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performances at the Red Hook Jazz Festival, held at the Urban Meadow community garden in Red Hook, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: On Sunday Red Hook Jazz Festival, at the Urban Meadow community garden in Brooklyn, featured groups like Travis Sullivan’s Bjorkestra, Hot Cup Chili Pepper 7 and the Flail.

headline.seo: Red Hook Jazz Festival, at Urban Meadow in Brooklyn
headline.main: A Festival of Reveling, Unhindered by Restraint
headline.print_headline: A Festival Of Reveling, Unhindered By Restraint
